I have a Trifield Natural EMF Meter. Cool instrument. I used it on an
investigation last summer and didn't get any sort of unusual readings. I'm
participating in another one this Saturday night and the place appears to be
very haunted. I'll let you know if I get any readings with it.

The little $10 "point and shoot" thermometers they sell at Harbor Freight
are a good deal, too. But the one I have appears to eat batteries.
:-(

Zack
